description: Detects file names used by different memory dumping tools to create a memory dump of the LSASS process memory, which contains user credentials
name: LSASS Process Memory Dump Files
query: (file.path:(*\\lsass.dmp OR *\\lsass.zip OR *\\lsass.rar OR *\\Temp\\dumpert.dmp OR *\\Andrew.dmp OR *\\Coredump.dmp) OR file.path:(*\\lsass_2* OR *\\lsassdump* OR *\\lsassdmp*) OR (file.path:*\\lsass* AND file.path:*.dmp*) OR (file.path:*SQLDmpr* AND file.path:*.mdmp))
author: Florian Roth
